en.title: FusionExcel Sponsors Product Prizes to Malaysia National Press Club Media Nite!
en.content:
The Malaysian National Press Club held its annual NPC-GAB Dinner & Dance 2008 bash (or Media Nite) at the Crystal Ballroom, PJ Hilton on 28th November 2008. The party was attended by over 600 journalists and supporters.

The program featured prize presentations for the winners of the recent NPC-GAB Media Games of darts, pool and futsal which commenced sometime in mid-October 2008.

The event is aimed at fostering goodwill and networking among the media, corporate partners and sponsors, as well as the EXCO and members of the National Press Club.

The NPC represents journalists of all the major newspaper and media companies in the country. Associate members include public relations practitioners and government information officers.

FusionExcel is once again proud to be associated with the fraternity, by sponsoring the lucky draw prizes consisting of the much-sought after Quantum Pendants, Quantum Bracelets and a pair of Quantum Watches for the Grand Prize. Photos show Encik Mokhtar Hussain, President of NPC, giving away prizes to some of the lucky winners.
